content: some yarn full of glorious spring colours just asked to be worked into a floral design these socks have been designed as fraternal with daisies on one sock and irises on the other if fraternal is not to your liking pick and choose between the charts to create the pair of socks you want to fit with the floral theme a honeycomb pattern was used for the sole gusset and back of the leg i also wanted the pattern to be inclusive for knitters not wanting floral socks so i chose a classic celtic knot to fill that niche the socks can be knit toe up with a heel flap and gusset or cuff down with either a heel flap and gusset or modified strong heel the instructions for the construction of the socks are written and the colour work pattern is both written and charted two **low vision accessible** versions of this pattern are also available daisy and iris or knot for the cuff down socks with heel flap and gusset each version includes 24 point arial all black text no italics no columns or tables and fully written instructions there are charts included but the charts are not needed to complete the pattern thank you to yalta snoopy678 studio249 peebs sinaida echeverialaui iriknit1 eternalknitter elchkitty ginzilla gwenoveva and other testers a huge thanks also to condichick yarnymama and yalta for their ongoing valued advice guidance feedback and encouragement a big thanks also to renee van hoy aka momcook for providing valuable feedback and guidance on how to make patterns suitable for print challenged knitters thanks also to members of the accessible patterns group /groups/accessible-patterns-group here on ravelry
